title: The Startown Hotel
setting: Walston's only proper hotel, near the starport
description: A modest but clean establishment. Three stories, local stone construction, modern amenities by frontier standards. The lobby has a small bar, a news terminal, and a bored-looking clerk.
atmosphere: Quiet, functional, surprisingly comfortable. Clearly accustomed to offworld visitors.

details.rooms: Simple but clean. Fresher unit, terminal with local net access, climate control.
details.amenities: Lobby bar, breakfast included, secure luggage storage
details.staff: Human clerk, Vargr doorman (Kfoukh), cleaning staff

narrator_prompt: The Startown Hotel is the only proper accommodation in the port district. A modest three-story building of local stone, it offers clean rooms, reliable climate control, and the kind of frontier hospitality that values function over luxury. The Vargr doorman, Kfoukh, stands ready at the entrance.

pc_knows: You need somewhere to stay while arranging transport to your ship
The porter Gvoudzon recommended this hotel
Your repair kit crates need secure storage
opening_context.pc_goal: Check in and secure your equipment

key_interactions.description: Arrange secure storage for repair kit
